casebody.data:
IN RE: SOUTHEASTERN EYE CENTER 358A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2016 Douglas S. Harris, Attorney at Law, for Harris, Douglas S. Scott F. Wyatt, Attorney at Law, High Point, Donavan J. Hylarides, Attorney at Law, James Mark McDaniel, Jr., for Harris, Douglas S., et al. Byron L. Saintsing, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Nivison Family Investments, LLC, et al. Robert E. Fields, III, Attorney at Law, Samuel Pinero, II, Attorney at Law, for Jeutter, Jr. receiver for CCSEA/SCLC/SEM/HUTA/EMS/KEPES/DRE.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 5th of December 2016 by Plaintiff (Gerald Jeutler, Jr., receiver):

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2016."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 8th day of December 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
